body:
Syntax: cast 'infravision'

Infravision grants you the ability to see in complete darkness by detecting
heat signatures. This spell is invaluable for exploring dark dungeons and
caves where normal vision fails.

Classes: Mage, Ranger
Level: 3 (Mage), 8 (Ranger)
Mana Cost: 5
Duration: 12 hours
Position: Standing or Fighting

With infravision active, you can navigate and fight effectively even in
areas with no light source. Many underground areas require this spell.

See Also: CREATE LIGHT
